basics.name: Anıl Can Baykal
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software engineer with production-proof experience in development of Mobile applications on different platforms. Managed mid sized software teams using agile methodes and delivered solid projects. An accomplished iOS developer with in-depth knowledge of the Apple ecosystem

work.summary: Co-founded and developed Turkey's first mobile payment platform, Ödeal İşyerim. Ödeal İşyerim allows registered businesses to accept credit card payments with the free app without having any hidden costs.
highlights: Recived the highest first round investment in Turkey [http://webrazzi.com/2015/03/11/sanko-online-mobil-odeme-sistemi-odeal-yatirim/]

work.summary: Joined Mobilike, one of the leading Mobile Advertising Company in Turkey, as the Mobile Applications Lead as they manage 80+ mobile applications developed by various 3rd parties.I was responsible from coordinating the development/integration process and als from development of the a advertising and analytics SDK, Makina (later rebranded to 'seamless'). After working with many 3rd party applications, developed  SaaS framework Handsomet oo address common issues of the mobile development. A new company called `Nomad Commerce` was created  which is focued on building Hansome backed-up mobile applications. Successfully developed two commercial applications (Yellow Medya and Cobone) on three platforms (iOS, Android, WinPhone) and a quiz application(Know now!) using Handsome framework with a team of five.
highlights: Handsome Framework (later open sourced under the name Lembas and Cortex[http://nomadcommerce.com/#cortex])

work.summary: I was hired as developer #2 at Pozitron and started working on the current J2ME framework which -still- empowers İşCep, Bilyoner on low end devices. I have moved afterwards to server side development with a project that controls provisioning and distribution of mobile applications to java based devices. Next, I have started developing on iOS platform and my first application was IsCep which is still operational. With the growth at Pozitron, I have became the Project Lead in most the projects (Biletix, Bilyoner, Thy..) and continued developing for iOS (ProDG, Finanscep).
highlights: ProDG iPad application for GlaxoSmithKline Turkey

work.summary: started as an intern at Sednacom and became full-time junior software developer. I have worked with Python and started  contributing to ongoing ERP project by developing sub-modules (ie payments, exten- sions).
Over the years, I have work on many successful project as a freelance contractor

publications.name: Happy-download
publications.summary: Multi threaded file download with ASIHTTPRequest

publications.name: Lembas Mobile Framework
publications.summary: A mobile framework to easily build iOS/Android applications with server and client libraries

awards.title: Applications and Interactive Media/Sales Category
awards.summary: ProdDG iPad application used by GlaxoSmithKline Turkey
